F0,E2.Name: Oversuds Alert
F0,E2.Description: Looks like there are too many suds in the washer. You may experience longer cycle times as the washer tries to clear the soap.

F0,E3.Name: Overloaded Washer Alert
F0,E3.Description: Looks like there's an oversized load in the washer. Overloading can significantly reduce performance.

F0,E4.Name: Spin Speed Limitation
F0,E4.Description: Spin speed is limited due to excessive incoming water temperature.

F0,E5.Name: Unbalanced Load Alert
F0,E5.Description: Looks like there's an unbalanced load in the washer. You may experience longer cycle times as the washer tries to correct for this.

F1,E1.Name: Communication Error
F1,E1.Description: Looks like there's an error that requires a washer reboot. Please see recommended action.

F2,E1.Name: UI Stuck Button
F2,E1.Description: One or more UI buttons are recognized as stuck on.

F2,E3.Name: Communication Error
F2,E3.Description: Looks like there's an error that requires a washer reboot. Please see recommended action.

F2,E4.Name: Communication Error
F2,E4.Description: Looks like there's an error that requires a washer reboot. Please see recommended action.

F2,E5.Name: Communication Error
F2,E5.Description: Looks like there's an error that requires a washer reboot. Please see recommended action.

F3,E1.Name: Water Level Alert
F3,E1.Description: Looks like the washer can't detect the water level. Please see recommended action.

F5,E2.Name: Lid Lock Error
F5,E2.Description: Looks like the washer can't engage its lid lock.

F5,E3.Name: Lid Unlock Error
F5,E3.Description: Looks like there's a performance issue with the lid lock. Do not try to force the lid open, as this could cause injury or damage to the washer. Please see recommended action.

F5,E4.Name: Lid not open between cycles
F5,E4.Description: Washer must see washer lid opening between cycles.  If it does not, a faulty lid switch feedback is assumed.  After fault detected, the system will not respond to Start Command until lid switch transition occurs.

F6,E2.Name: Communication Error
F6,E2.Description: Looks like there's an error that requires a washer reboot. Please see recommended action.

F6,E3.Name: Communication error
F6,E3.Description: Looks like there's an error that requires a washer reboot. Please see recommended action.

F8,E1.Name: Water Fill Delay Alert
F8,E1.Description: Looks like the washer is taking too long to fill or will not fill and has cancelled the cycle. Please see recommended action.

F8,E3.Name: Overflow or Flood Condition
F8,E3.Description: Product at risk of overflow or flood condition.  System enters Cycle Drainout state.

F9,E1.Name: Drain System Alert
F9,E1.Description: Looks like the washer is taking longer to drain than expected. Please see recommended action.

NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Name: Quiet While Home
NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Description: Your washer will automatically go into Quiet Mode when Nest™ is set to Home.
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Name: Smart Energy
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Description: Use Smart Delay to delay your washer from running during peak energy hours.

SpecialtyCycles.AthleticHighPerformanceWear.Name: Athletic / High Performance Wear
SpecialtyCycles.AthleticHighPerformanceWear.Description: A cycle for cleaning work out clothing.
SpecialtyCycles.AthleticHighPerformanceWear.LongDescript: A cycle for cleaning work out clothing.
SpecialtyCycles.BrightColors.Name: Bright Colors
SpecialtyCycles.BusinessCasual.Name: Business Casual
SpecialtyCycles.BusinessCasual.Description: A cycle to wash loads of no-iron fabrics such as sport shirts, blouses, casual business clothes, and blends.
SpecialtyCycles.BusinessCasual.LongDescription: A cycle to wash loads of no-iron fabrics such as sport shirts, blouses, casual business clothes, and blends.
SpecialtyCycles.Comforters.Name: Comforters
SpecialtyCycles.Comforters.Description: A cycle to wash bulky items such as comforters.
SpecialtyCycles.Comforters.LongDescription: A cycle to wash bulky items such as comforters.
SpecialtyCycles.HandwashFabrics.Name: Handwash Fabrics
SpecialtyCycles.HandwashFabrics.Description: A cycle for small loads of items labeled "handwash," undergarments, silks, etc. Note: use mesh garment bags as needed
SpecialtyCycles.HandwashFabrics.LongDescription: A cycle for small loads of items labeled "handwash," undergarments, silks, etc. Note: use mesh garment bags as needed
SpecialtyCycles.HeavyDuty.Name: Heavy Duty
SpecialtyCycles.HeavyDuty.Description: A cycle for sturdy colorfast fabrics and heavily soiled garments.
SpecialtyCycles.HeavyDuty.LongDescription: A cycle for sturdy colorfast fabrics and heavily soiled garments.
SpecialtyCycles.Intimates.Name: Intimates
SpecialtyCycles.Intimates.Description: A cycle for delicate intimate garments such as bras, sheer fabrics, and lingerie. Note: use mesh garment bags as needed
SpecialtyCycles.Intimates.LongDescription: A cycle for delicate intimate garments such as bras, sheer fabrics, and lingerie. Note: use mesh garment bags as needed
SpecialtyCycles.SleepingBags.Name: Sleeping Bags
SpecialtyCycles.SleepingBags.Description: A cycle to wash bulky items such as sleeping bags.
SpecialtyCycles.SleepingBags.LongDescription: A cycle to wash bulky items such as sleeping bags.
SpecialtyCycles.Swimwear.Name: Swimwear
SpecialtyCycles.Swimwear.Description: A cycle for swim garments (we recommend no detergent for this cycle)
SpecialtyCycles.Swimwear.LongDescription: A cycle for swim garments (we recommend no detergent for this cycle)
SpecialtyCycles.Towels.Name: Towels

ClothesClean.Name: Clothes Clean
ClothesClean.Description: Don't worry about checking the washer, it will let you know when the clothes are clean.

Overloaded.Name: Overloaded Washer Alert
Overloaded.Description: When your washer detects that something is wrong it speaks up, texting, emailing, or alerting you in the app so you can keep it running perfectly.

OverSuds.Name: Oversuds Alert
OverSuds.Description: When your washer detects that something is wrong it speaks up, texting, emailing, or alerting you in the app so you can keep it running perfectly.

SystemAlerts.Name: System Alerts
SystemAlerts.Description: When your washer detects that something is wrong it speaks up, texting, emailing, or alerting you in the app so you can keep it running perfectly.

Unbalanced.Name: Unbalanced Load Alert
Unbalanced.Description: When your washer detects that something is wrong it speaks up, texting, emailing, or alerting you in the app so you can keep it running perfectly.

SmartTip.Title: Tip 1
SmartTip.Content: With typical usage, your clothes washer uses, per year, more than three times the energy of a hair dryer. Use the Energy Advisor feature to reduce your energy foot-print. Now that’s Smart!

SmartTip.Title: Tip 2
SmartTip.Content: Clean clothes = better attendance rates. School administrators have found that students not having clean clothes to wear is a known contributor to truancy.

UomDisplay.TopLoadWasherSlot2UomDisplay: Top Load Washer Slot 2 OUM Display
